subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marco Belinelli scored 18 points as the host San Antonio Spurs extended their winning streak to 17 games with a 96-80 victory over the New Orleans Pelicans.
snippet: Marco Belinelli scored 18 points as the host San Antonio Spurs extended their winning streak to 17 games with a 96-80 victory over the New Orleans Pelicans.
